LanguageData.VPE_CropBurst.description: Infuses a fertile area with life-attuned mana, causing it to sprout plantable crops that finish growth in relation to the caster’s magical aptitude.
LanguageData.VPE_WordofAnimals.label: word of animals
LanguageData.VPE_WordofAnimals.description: Magically soothe the roiling emotions of an animal, either calming a manhunting animal or taming them.
LanguageData.VPE_ManhunterPulse.description: Drive nearby animals into a manhunting rage using an intense undirected magical blast.
LanguageData.VPE_ShieldAnimals.description: Generates spherical mana shields on all colony animals in range that disintegrates all incoming and outgoing ground-level projectiles to base atoms. People and items are not affected and the duration scales with the caster’s magical aptitude.
LanguageData.VPE_AnimalAllies.description: Infuses a large area with harmonic life-attuned mana that influences animal behavior, causing them to attack those hostile to the caster for a duration scaling with their magical aptitude.
LanguageData.VPE_Shrineshield.description: Generate a spherical mana shield on a nature shrine that disintegrates all incoming and outgoing ground-level projectiles to base atoms. People and items are not affected and the size of the sphere depends on the size of the shrine.
LanguageData.VPE_SummonPack.description: Sends out a pulse of life-attuned mana into the region, inducing territorial manhunting aggression into numerous animals that will appear to defend the colony. Once all invaders are defeated, the animals will return to their homes. The distance the pulse travels, and with that the relative strength of the creatures are influenced by the caster’s magical aptitude.
